About me

A little about me

Hi, I am Akbar, a full stack web developer and designer from Seoul, South Korea. I love making dynamic apps for the web and exploring new technologies.
From technical standpoint, I mainly use Javascript and Python for development and have become pretty good at them.
For the past two years I have worked with wide range of development tools and frameworks. I mosty make use of Django, Node.js and React.js.
I can help you in all sorts of web development related tasks in your project from UI/UX design to designing database schemas and APIs.
If you have anything to ask, shoot me an email or find me on Twitter. There are worse things you could do!
